short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto open the selected add-on when Gmail, Calendar, Drive or Docs starts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically opens the Workspace addon you like when the Google service is started in your browser (addon sidebar is shown on page load). It supports addons from Gmail, Google Calendar, Google Drive and Google Docs.
